Carnage/Teltoli


* Carnage watched Cyber Claw transform back into Beast Mode and thought it 
reasonable to do so as well.*

" Beast Mode!"

* Now in the familiar scales of her Beast Mode she relaxed a little, at 
least they weren't ready to bite each others heads off now!
Carnage looked at Teltoli and saw that she was glaring at Cyber Claw, but 
then again...she couldn't blame her could she?*
*Teltoli came from behind the tree and whispered to Carnage...*

" And THIS is the bot you saved from fate? If I were you I would have left 
her to the jaws of that creature!"

* Carnage smiled at Teltoli's comment but then turned to Cyber Claw.*

" Alright, you can join us...but the first time that you attack my friend 
without a good reason I'll sink my teeth into your throat and rip out your 
jugular, got it?"

* Carnage turned towards the direction that the Maximal base lay in but 
stopped and looked at Cyber Claw.*

" You first."
